name: Rule: Play
description:
A quirky puzzle game about following rules.

---

Done as part of the GMTK 2019 game jam. The take on the theme, 'Only One', is with the "only one" rule you need to follow.

---

I only managed to get done about half of what I had planned. I'm quite excited for the later levels so I definitely plan to revisit the game and finish it after the jam's judging is over. You can stay updated with any new levels in the game on my twitter!

Thanks for playing!
